name: Sigiriya Rock Fortress
description: Sigiriya, also known as Lion Rock, is an ancient rock fortress and one of Sri Lanka's most iconic landmarks. It features stunning frescoes, water gardens, and the remains of a royal citadel atop a massive rock.

name: Temple of the Sacred Tooth Relic
description: The Temple of the Sacred Tooth Relic, located in Kandy, is one of the most revered Buddhist sites in Sri Lanka. It houses a relic believed to be a tooth of the Buddha and is a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
imageAlt: Temple of the Sacred Tooth Relic in Kandy

name: Yala National Park
description: Yala National Park is one of the largest and most visited national parks in Sri Lanka, renowned for its diverse wildlife, including leopards, elephants, and a variety of bird species. It offers thrilling safari experiences.

name: Udawalawe National Park
description: Udawalawe National Park is famous for its large population of elephants and diverse wildlife.

name: Ratnapura Gems
description: Ratnapura, known as the 'City of Gems', is famous for its rich deposits of precious and semi-precious stones. Visitors can explore gem mines, learn about the gem trade, and purchase exquisite jewelry.

name: Wilpattu National Park
description: Wilpatu National Park is one of the oldest and largest national parks in Sri Lanka, known for its unique 'villus' (natural lakes) and diverse wildlife, including leopards, elephants, and a variety of bird species.

name: Nallur Kandaswamy Kovil
description: Nallur Kandaswamy Kovil is a significant Hindu temple in Jaffna, known for its stunning architecture and vibrant festivals. It is a center of Tamil culture and spirituality.

name: Nilaveli Beach
description: Nilaveli Beach is a stunning stretch of white sand and clear blue waters located near Trincomalee. It is perfect for swimming, snorkeling, and relaxing by the sea.

name: Kalpitiya Beach
description: Kalpitiya Beach is known for its pristine beauty, water sports, and dolphin watching. It is a popular destination for kitesurfing and offers a tranquil escape with its lagoons and sandy beaches.

name: Hikkaduwa Beach
description: Hikkaduwa Beach is a vibrant coastal destination known for its coral reefs, water sports, and lively nightlife. It offers opportunities for snorkeling, diving, and enjoying the local seafood.

name: Dambulla Cave Temple
description: Dambulla Cave Temple, also known as the Golden Temple of Dambulla, is a UNESCO World Heritage Site featuring a complex of caves adorned with ancient Buddhist murals and statues. It is one of the best-preserved cave temple complexes in Sri Lanka.

name: Colombo
description: Colombo is the bustling capital city of Sri Lanka, known for its vibrant culture, colonial architecture, and modern skyline. The Colombo Lotus Tower is a prominent landmark offering panoramic views of the city.

name: Ella
description: Ella is a picturesque hill station known for its stunning landscapes, tea plantations, and hiking trails. Key attractions include Ella Rock, Nine Arches Bridge, and the Ravana Falls.

name: Anuradhapura
description: Anuradhapura is an ancient city and UNESCO World Heritage Site, known for its well-preserved ruins of ancient Sri Lankan civilization. It features impressive stupas, temples, and the sacred Sri Maha Bodhi tree.

name: Kithulgala
description: Kithulgala is a popular adventure destination known for white-water rafting, trekking, and bird watching. It is set in a lush rainforest environment and offers opportunities for eco-tourism.

name: Mirissa
description: Mirissa is a beautiful coastal town known for its stunning beaches, whale watching, and vibrant nightlife. It is a popular destination for tourists seeking relaxation and marine adventures.

name: Arugam Bay
description: Arugam Bay is a world-renowned surfing destination known for its consistent waves and laid-back atmosphere. It attracts surfers from around the globe and offers a range of accommodations and beachside cafes.

name: Polonnaruwa
description: Polonnaruwa is an ancient city and UNESCO World Heritage Site, known for its well-preserved ruins of the medieval Sri Lankan capital. It features impressive temples, statues, and the Royal Palace complex.

name: Bentota
description: Bentota is a popular beach destination known for its golden sandy beaches, water sports, and luxury resorts. It offers a perfect blend of relaxation and adventure with activities like jet skiing, windsurfing, and boat rides on the Bentota River.
